articles.title: Apple's rival to Amazon Prime is available on your iPhone and iPad today - Express
articles.description: APPLE One was announced earlier this year with it offering an easier way to subscribe to Apple's entertainment services and now this rival to Amazon Prime is available on your iPhone.
articles.content: Apple first announced its new Apple One subscription service back in September with these new monthly plans aimed at offering a simplified way of accessing music, gaming, TV shows and storage for all… [+2280 chars]
